Héloïse is not allowed to know anything about this, because the painting is for her future husband, whom she does not want to marry. In the course of time, Marianne and Héloïse become closer.

An unknown person has stolen Cam's clown costume and is using it to scare people. Cam is outraged that someone is ruining the good name of his clown Fizbo, which distracts him from the upcoming bowling tournament that Mitch would like to win. Phil is throwing the bachelor party for his dad, but has his own idea of fun, and Manny has written a play.

After Phil failed at last year's charity basketball game at school, he has practiced hard this time. But the presence of two NBA stars puts him under pressure. Gloria also does something for the event this time. Claire tries to hide a mistake at work from Jay, and Haley tells Mitch relationship secrets over tea.

Cult film from 1986, which got several sequels. The Highlander lives in the mountains of Scotland, loses the love of his life and becomes immortal. In 1985, he is an antiques dealer in New York City and falls in love with a pathologist. But even in the USA, danger from his equally immortal nemesis lurks everywhere and at all times.

Mitch has accidentally knocked over the urn of Cam's beloved pig Lily, but tries to keep it a secret. Luke has only gotten rejections on his college applications so far, but now Phil and Claire are secretly going to see the dean. Jay has failed to book Gloria a ticket for a concert, but pretends that he has.

A lot can happen in five minutes in the family clan: Cam and Mitch almost miss their flight while on sleeping pills, Phil and Claire visit Alex unannounced and find out she has a boyfriend, Jay and Gloria have an argument in the car while Manny looks for a parking space, and Haley and her boyfriend go to a restaurant with unexpected consequences.
A narrative of several families with their stories and problems that each character has his story and past.

Seventh part of the Harry Potter franchise, in which Voldemort's followers have taken power. Harry, Ron and Hermione are on the run and have to destroy Voldemort's Horcruxes to be able to kill him. After the three of them got into a fight, Harry learns about the Deathly Hallows. The rescue?

Phil and his family go to his father's wedding dressed up in 1920s style. But they are the only ones there in costume. Because of his age, Jay has given himself the right to say no when the others want something from him, and Cam and Mitch get another visit from Cam's annoying sister Pam, who now wants to become a model.

Kathleen owns a small bookstore in New York and has become anonymous friends with Joe via e-mail. Neither of them suspect that they are rivals in real life, because he is the owner of a large bookstore chain that is opening a new branch in Kathleen's neighborhood.

The women of the family are on their way to a demonstration for gender equality, where Luke and Manny are also present, but are delayed by a car breakdown. Phil and Jay disagree over which of two applicants should be a guard in their parking lot, and Pam is overwhelmed with her baby but wants help from Mitch rather than Cam.

In the middle of the Indian Ocean, a lone sailor (Robert Redford) on his yacht has a collision with a container floating in the sea. The incoming water renders the radio equipment unusable. A storm that hits shortly afterwards further destroys the sailboat. The sailor desperately tries to avert the sinking.

Mitch is exhausted and tells Jay that he would like to spend a day off in a hotel, but doesn't have the courage to tell Cam. Then he does and Cam even lets him go, but Jay is also at the hotel, who wasn't expecting this. Meanwhile, Cam is upsetting Gloria and Manny's lives and Phil and Claire are running away from their annoying children.

The whole family is out on a houseboat on a lake because Jay wants them all to experience a solar eclipse together. After the death of a colleague, it is important to him that his family has fond memories of him in the event of his passing. But things go wrong during the short vacation, and Mitch also runs into an old flame.

Manny's time at college begins, but he and his parents definitely don't want any tears to say goodbye. Claire and Phil pay an unannounced visit to Alex's college, but contrary to her parents' fears, she seems to have her life under control. Mitch thinks Cam is responsible for burning down her kitchen, and Haley works at the golf club with Luke.

Phil wants to go on a spontaneous trip to Paris with Claire, but they have to stay up all night. Cam's sister Pam is visiting, but is a nervous wreck after separating from her husband, which Mitch in particular can't stand. Jay and Gloria have a fight about his bathroom remodeling and Haley and Andy get into a wild night out.

Muharrem is a devout Muslim and lives in Istanbul. He has to give up his modest life in favor of a new job and is confronted with the modern world. But the contradiction between religious righteousness and Western liberalism quickly becomes unbearable for him.

A family with an adult son and a lively little boy are traveling north by car in Iran. The parents have told the younger son that his brother is getting married soon, but that was a white lie. And so only the youngest is carefree on the journey.

Phil is convinced that he's having a bad day because, in his opinion, this is shown by whether he can catch his underpants in the morning. Claire, of course, thinks this is nonsense. Jay thinks Gloria has had an accident, but she won't admit it. Mitch doesn't feel taken seriously by the workmen in the house and Haley has to manage without her cell phone.

Jay bumps into his best friend Shorty, who is visiting from Costa Rica. He invites him to his house, but Shorty seems to get on better with Gloria than with Jay. Alex wants to get back at her mother Claire for making Ben look so bad by using an erotic painting set, and Cam and Mitch have the adopted son of their friends over, who are not at all child-friendly.

It's Halloween and Phil and Claire want to celebrate as usual, but their children feel too old for it. Jay is now renovating Cam and Mitch's kitchen and they are staying with Jay and Gloria, but Gloria is annoyed by this and Jay is making no progress with the work. Meanwhile, Alex wants to leave Ben and Haley has a job interview.

It's Jay and Gloria's 10th wedding anniversary and Phil wants to perform a magic trick with Gloria at the party. But then he finds out that Jay cheated him out of a job years ago. Gloria, on the other hand, is in a bad mood because she no longer fits into her wedding dress and Manny isn't coming to the party, which is Jay's fault. Meanwhile, Cam tries to persuade Mitch to sing at the party.

In the early 1960s in Montana: Margaret and George's ranch is home to their son James, daughter-in-law Lorna and newborn Jimmy. But James dies in an accident and Lorna remarries, to a man who beats her. Soon afterwards, the three of them disappear without a trace and Margaret sets off with George in search of their grandchild.

Jay is proud of his family at Thanksgiving because everyone has been successful: Claire won a race, Mitch chased off a burglar, Phil pulled off a magic trick, Cam was successful as a coach and Gloria walked 100,000 steps. But it turns out that they weren't all telling the truth in their success stories...

The family members remember encounters with celebrities, none of which have gone well. Phil wanted to sell a house to Chris Martin from Coldplay, Jay met ex-footballer Terry Bradshaw as a jury member, Mitch and Cam see the host of a garden show in a garden center and Manny meets his favorite playwright in a restaurant.

2024 in an America devastated by nuclear war: Vic is a sex addict and has a loyal friend, the dog Blood. Brought under the control of subterraneans by decoy Quilla, he ekes out an existence there as a \sperm donor\". But he manages to escape with Quilla."

Phil goes on a camping trip alone in the wilderness, which doesn't go as planned, while Claire becomes a truck driver for the company. Gloria doesn't like the fact that Manny is bringing a lecturer home, and while Cam is ridiculed at school, Mitch accidentally swaps Pam's baby for Lily's doll.

Zain, who is about twelve years old, is in prison because he stabbed a man. His parents don't know his exact age and he has no papers. Zain is now suing his parents because they gave birth to him in a poor neighborhood despite their precarious situation. He tells his story, how his sister was forced into marriage and he ended up living with an illegal Ethiopian woman.

For the first time, the family's closet company has been invited to an international expo. Claire celebrates this as her success, but Jay insists on his share. Phil is about to sell a house, but the prospective buyer thinks it's haunted. Pam's ex Bo is at the door and wants to make up, and Luke and Alex are selling shoes to fetishists.

Jay takes his son Joe golfing and instantly sees that the little boy has talent. Full of ambition, he immediately enters him in a tournament. Claire is furious when she learns that the homeowners' association has forbidden her to build a small hut in the garden, and during Lily's birthday party Cam is shocked to learn the truth about his father.

Cam and Mitch have a visit from a traveling acquaintance. But Max is getting into their expensive things, so they want to get rid of him quickly. Manny tells Phil that Luke has been missing since the night before, so they set off with Gloria to look for him. Jay's favorite enemy Earl is dead and he has to take care of the urn, while Haley meets a professor at Alex's university.

Phil is with Gloria when he gets severe stomach pains, so she takes him straight to hospital. The whole family rushes to Phil's bedside. Above all, he wants his lucky teddy bear from Claire, but it is nowhere to be found. While Joe wants to know from his parents whether he will die too, Mitch regrets that he told Cam who he would marry if Cam died.
Independent psychological thriller by Canadian David Cronenberg starring Jude Law, Jennifer Jason Leigh, Ian Holm and Willem Dafoe, in which reality and virtual reality intermingle.

Phil warns Jay that he should do something very special this Valentine's Day, because Gloria is angry with him. So this time Jay and Gloria try romantic role-playing. Meanwhile, Phil and Claire keep an eye on Joe, who is falling in love with Claire. Mitch and Cam get a seat at the restaurant next to Luke, who waits in vain for his date, and Haley meets with Alex's professor.

Jay overhears Gloria talking to her friend on the phone and now thinks she's into spanking. Mitch has got a new job with a billionaire and he and Cam want to rub it in their friends' faces at a party for which they have bought an expensive piano. Alex helps Phil, who has a dispute with a business neighbor over a parking space.

Haley has invited the family to her boss's country house and the most important rule is not to touch the precious tiara. But of course nobody sticks to it and then it's broken. Since everyone has secret plans - Jay has his dog with him, Mitch and Gloria are at a celebrity party and Phil and Cam are training for a dance class - the culprit is hard to find.

Betty, recently widowed, and Roy, who also lives alone, meet via a dating portal. Betty is very taken with the old gentleman and soon lets the seemingly physically unfit man live in her spacious house. But Roy is a con man and only Betty's grandson Steven is suspicious.

Media satire by Austrian director Hans Weingartner. Out of anger at the low-level television program, a group of activists set out to manipulate the quota system of German TV stations and thus free society from bad television.

Series adaptation of the comic of the same name by Robert Kirkman and Tony Moore about a world after a zombie apocalypse. The zombies are everywhere, the characters are constantly on the run from the vicious zombies and fight for their survival.

Jorge, one of Gloria's exes, comes to visit while she is away. Jay immediately notices what Manny doesn't even realize: Jorge is extremely similar to Manny. Could he be his father? Cam and Mitch reach the limits of their fatherhood when they realize that Lily is slowly entering puberty. Phil, meanwhile, has no idea whatsoever for a wedding anniversary present this time, unlike Claire.

Adam has a psychotic break at his high school, injuring a fellow student. He is diagnosed with schizophrenia and has to leave school. As a last resort, his mother organizes a place at a Catholic school. There Adam meets the feisty Maya. But he doesn't want her to find out about his illness ...

Because her husband is dead and her hometown is doomed following the closure of the local gypsum factory, Fern packs her belongings into a van and moves from job to job across the USA as a nomad. Along the way, she makes the acquaintance of other outsiders who also no longer have a permanent home, but most of the time she is alone with herself.

Haley's job is in jeopardy, so she tries to convince Gloria to sell the recipe for her salsa sauce to her boss. Cam and Mitch have the opportunity to ride along on a police patrol because Mitch has been offered a job as a prosecutor, which Cam doesn't know about. Phil and Claire want to race to see who is faster, while Luke has no desire to go to college.

DeDe, Mitch and Claire's mother, pays a surprise visit, which pleases no one. Mitch finds out that she has been secretly in email contact with Cam and has been manipulating them. Phil has destroyed a picture of Claire and her children have bad news for her too, while Manny gets the family together for a horror movie he made with Jay.

Jay's unloved sister Becky has had a stroke. He, Claire, Mitch and their partners go to the hospital, where they learn that Becky has lost her memory. The three of them plan to use this to their advantage, while Gloria, Phil and Cam accidentally lock themselves in a basement room at the hospital. Meanwhile, Haley meets Arvin's parents, which doesn't end well...

Theresa 'Tree' Gelbman wakes up on her birthday with a terrible hangover in the bed of a stranger. From there it's all downhill for the student and the day fittingly ends with her being murdered. And waking up in the same bed again...

The plot follows on directly from the first part, in which Theresa 'Tree' Gelbman was able to prevent her own death and free herself from the time loop in which she was trapped. Or so she thought. Because apparently the problem has just shifted to someone else...

Mitch has finally dared to go to a fan convention with Phil, but is afraid of making a fool of himself. However, Phil is more likely to do so. Jay and Claire get a visit from a start-up that wants to take over their company. Gloria's kindergarten party turns into a flop, while Cam and Mitch decide to take in Cam's sister's child and Manny goes on a trip.

The 4th of July is just around the corner and Jay is to open the parade as Grand Marshal. Phil and Luke want to win the hot dog eating contest, while Claire and Alex have settled into a lazy life. Cam and Mitch want to show Cal's mother in a video that he has learned something from them, and Haley meets ex Dylan again.

Tom Hanks plays an employee of a logistics company who is stranded on an uninhabited South Sea island after a cargo plane crashes. He struggles for years to survive and return to the civilized world, with a washed-up volleyball as his only companion.

The eccentric statistician Otto has just made room for a woman and her daughter on the train when an accident occurs and the woman dies. Otto is certain that it was an attack by a criminal gang. So he and his nerd friends turn to Markus, the woman's widower. The emotionally disturbed soldier wants revenge...

The whole family has gathered at Jay and Gloria's though no one knows why. Haley feels guilty about kissing ex Dylan and doesn't know if she should confess to Arvin. Manny is back from his trip and tells everyone that he has a girlfriend, but no one believes him, and Phil wants to get back at Jay by being mean to him.

Film adaptation of the science fiction novel by author Douglas Adams. Arthur Dent wakes up one morning to find his house being demolished to make way for a bypass. But then he realizes that he has the same problem on a larger scale: Aliens want to blow up the Earth because of a galactic hyperspace highway...

Phil is thrilled when he is offered a job teaching a real estate course at Luke's college, but Luke is against it. Jay and Claire and their new start-up partners clash immediately as their work ethic differs massively. Mitch is portrayed very unfavorably by the courtroom sketch artist on his first case as a prosecutor, while Alex has career doubts.

Haley can't decide between ex Dylan and current boyfriend Arvin, and just as Dylan is at Haley's for a talk, Arvin arrives unexpectedly from Switzerland. Manny has brought his Canadian girlfriend home with him. She quickly gets on Jay and Gloria's nerves, but they don't want to admit it. Mitch is with Cam and the kids at a work colleague's house, which doesn't end well.
The theater director Kafuku unexpectedly loses his wife, from whom he had become estranged but whom he still loved. Two years later, he is asked to direct the play \Uncle Vanya\"
column3: where he meets one of his wife's lovers. For insurance reasons
column4: he is provided with a driver for the trips to the theater
column5: but the reserved Misaki has also experienced loss."

abstract: It's Halloween again and the family members want to celebrate properly as usual. But then bad news breaks in the middle of the festivities and the family gathers at the Dunphys' instead. However, everyone's coping with their grief looks a little different ...
French comedy by Francis Veber about a group of well-to-do French people who make it fun to bring a \jerk\" to each of their dinners
column3: who of course knows nothing of his task. But when publisher Brochant wants to bring the super jerk Pignon along
column4: his wife leaves him and he injures himself
column5: leaving him stuck in his apartment with Pignon."

abstract: The author of adventure novels Loretta Sage has become reclusive after the death of her husband and has little desire to present her new book with Alan, the simple-minded model of her book covers. But then she is abducted to a remote island by billionaire Fairfax because he believes Loretta can decipher a fragment of text relating to a treasure. Alan follows them to free her ...

Phil is worried that one of his students might drop out and his course might fail to reach the minimum number of participants. That's why he takes special care of student Paige. Jay has befriended a mom at Joe's school, but Mitch and Cam think there's more to it. Meanwhile, Mitch is ashamed of Cam and Gloria worries that Joe might become a habitual liar.
The series takes a look at the formative years of the later serial killer Norman Bates, which he spent together with his mother, Norma Bates, whom he later also murdered.

Controversial film series about the life of Jesus Christ by screenwriter and director Mel Gibson. The first part of the series was released in 2004 and was a huge commercial success despite its drastic and controversial depictions of violence. The second part of the series is planned for 2024.

A little clerk (Harold Lloyd in his most famous role) tries unsuccessfully to earn money for his wedding in the big city. However, he pretends to his fiancée that he has a managerial position. When she unexpectedly comes to visit, he organizes a spectacular climbing event on the facade of his department store to get some money.

A film crew from National Geographic (including Jennifer Lopez as Terri Flores) sets off into the Amazon jungle to shoot a report on an unknown indigenous people. They soon make the acquaintance of the unscrupulous Paul Sarone (Jon Voight), who wants to show them the way. But Sarone has other plans: he wants to hunt the giant Anaconda constrictor.

Golden retriever Enzo is dying and recaps his life with racing driver Denny, which began when he took him in as a puppy. Enzo witnessed his races, his marriage to Eve and the birth of their daughter. But the family happiness doesn't last forever ...

To feel closer to his farming roots, Cam buys a chicken. But it quickly gets on his nerves, which he doesn't tell Mitch. He in turn hides the fact that he likes the animal. Alex manages to get a government job, but the whole family has to be present at the interview. Luke is annoying with his new psychology skills and Jay and Gloria argue about Joe's upbringing.

Homer accidentally volunteers for the school crossing guard service at school. Shortly afterwards, during an incident at the nuclear power plant, he learns that he is considered useless. But then he saves Ralph's life as a school crossing guard. But the popularity this brings him soon goes to his head.

The couple Thayer and Anne have moved in next door to the Simpsons and the family immediately try to make a good impression. They seem to succeed, because Thayer, a sports car salesman, invites Homer to meet him and lets him test drive a car. Meanwhile, Lisa tries to stop the out-of-control Bully Nelson.

900 years after humanity almost wiped itself out, two superpowers are fighting for supremacy in Trinity Blood: the Vatican and the Empire, one from Rome, the other from Byzantium. Humans are the victims of a new breed of vampire, who in turn are hunted by the so-called Kresnik. Trinity Blood is a Japanese anime based on the novels by Sunao Yoshida.

Historical drama directed by Robert Redford: In 1865, young lawyer Frederick Aiken is called upon to defend Mary Surratt, who is accused of being involved in the assassination of Abraham Lincoln. Although he is not convinced of her innocence himself, he soon realizes that the trial is politically controlled and highly unfair.

Reality TV format that has been broadcast on German TV channel RTL since 2016. Various celebrity couples spend several weeks together in a house. Through knowledge and skill games as well as nominations from the other couples, one couple after the other is eliminated. The remaining couple can call themselves \Celebrity Couple of the Year\" and receive a prize of 50
column3: 000 euros."

abstract: Well-known celebrities from German reality TV shows have to face up to their past \sins\" in a camp. In the so-called \"Round of Shame\"
column3: they are confronted with their bad behavior by presenter Olivia Jones. This is followed by a symbolic \"punishment\". In nominations and competitions
column4: one candidate per show is eliminated. The winner receives a prize."

abstract: German reality show based on the concept of \Big Brother\" with celebrity participants who are filmed by cameras for 24 hours. The participants have to compete against each other in games. The celebrities are gradually voted out of the show by nominations from the participants or the TV audience. A winner emerges from each season of the series."

Haley doesn't know where things are going to go with her and Dylan, especially as she has the opportunity to move up at work. Cam trains his football team with Jay for an important game, but his motivational speeches are not politically correct. Phil and Mitch want to go to a Star Wars event but end up in a gay bar, and Alex wants outfit tips from Gloria.

After the publisher of an American magazine produced in France has died, one last issue is published with four articles: about the town of Ennui, where the magazine is based, an artist and murderer, who paints his masterpiece in prison, a student revolt in Ennui and a cook and policeman who has to help out in a child abduction case.

In the Madrigal family, led by grandmother Alma, everyone is given a supernatural gift through a magic candle in their magic house, which they use for the good of the whole village. Only granddaughter Mirabel has not been given any special powers, which makes her an outsider in the family. But then she discovers that the house is cracking and tries to save the family's miracle.

Zombie film by George A. Romero from 1985. The horror film is the third part of Romero's zombie series. The film is indexed in some countries due to its explicit depictions of violence. It is about a group of people who, in a world full of zombies, search for a cure in a bunker that will ensure the survival of mankind.

12-year-old Oskar is an outsider when pale Eli moves in next door to him. It doesn't take long for Oskar to put the numerous murders that happen around him down to the fact that Eli is a vampire trapped in a girl's body. Nevertheless, they become friends.

The architect and lecturer Erik inherits a villa in the 1970s. His wife Anna persuades him to move in with his daughter Freja and friends and set up a commune. When Erik falls in love with his student Emma, Anna suggests letting her move in so as not to lose Erik. But that doesn't go well...

It's Christmas and the party is supposed to be at Jay and Gloria's, but they have discovered a poisonous spider in a present. So the party has to be moved to Claire and Phil's without further ado. Phil, however, has secretly borrowed the Christmas tree and presents for a house presentation. Haley finally wants to tell the family her big secret, but when and how?

Jerry, DeDe's widower, comes to visit to give the family members the heirlooms that DeDe intended for them. Mitch takes a tree with DeDe's ashes, while Claire gets her mother's old sports car. Haley despairs because she can't even manage to take care of a doll, and Jay and Gloria have a fight over Gloria so lavishly inviting relatives over.

Akiko lives with her father Shukichi, where her older sister Takako has also returned after separating from her husband. Their mother Kisako left the family when Akiko was still very young, which causes her a lot of trouble, as does the fact that she is unintentionally pregnant by her boyfriend. But then she meets Kisako again by chance, who pretends to be a former neighbor.
Romantic teen comedy starring Julia Stiles and Heath Ledger, loosely based on Shakespeare's \The Taming of the Shrew\". Cameron falls in love with the pretty Bianca at his new school. However
column3: she's more interested in the pretty boy and intellectual low-flyer Joey and isn't allowed to go out until her older
column4: prickly sister Kat has a date anyway. A plan matures..."

abstract: Ambitious medical student Paula is invited to attend an elite anatomy course in Heidelberg in the summer. There she uncovers a deadly secret society that turns living people into exhibits.

Roy Andersson tells the story of human existence in 39 bizarre miniatures. Among them are the two traveling novelty salesmen Sam and Jonathan, who try unsuccessfully to sell their three products, which are supposed to bring people fun that the two themselves don't have at all.

Haley and Dylan move into their own apartment, but Claire in particular is sure that the two of them won't get their lives together. Pam is out of prison and Cam thinks it's because Mitch stood up for her, but he didn't. Gloria thinks Manny's girlfriend is bossing him around and tries to get Jay to talk to him about it.

A documentary follows Persephone Odair, who is looking for a financier for her product that turns salt water into drinking water, and is introduced to Mr. Burns by Lisa. He is eventually not only persuaded, but also falls in love with her. Persephone is allowed to use part of the power plant for her project, but there are growing doubts about it.

Fereshteh moved to Tehran to study. She gave birth to an illegitimate child there, which she hid from the authorities and her family. Unexpectedly, her parents announce that they will be visiting the city for two days in a few hours. Fereshteh and her friend Atefeh desperately try to find a place for the baby to stay ...

Claire and Phil want to take a trip to Italy before Haley and Dylan move in with them. But then the two arrive unexpectedly early, and with them Dylan's mother. Gloria and Jay try to outdo each other over Joe as to who had the better ancestors, and Cam gets jealous over an old magazine he found at Mitch's.

The young acoustician Chanteraide is responsible for the sonar of a French Navy submarine. During a mission off Syria, he hears a signal that he cannot identify and belongs to a previously unknown type of submarine. While Chanteraide tries to find out more, tensions rise between Russia and the West.

A video conference is held at Claire and Jay's company, but once again Jay can't cope with the technology and doesn't feel comfortable there either. Gloria tricks Phil into taking part in a photo shoot, while Mitch hopes for career opportunities by baking cupcakes for his boss and Cam wants to boost his profile by organizing an event for his students.

After the death of his wife from cancer, David is raising their now 16-year-old daughter Margot alone. One evening, Margot tries to call her father and then disappears without a trace. David logs into Margot's social media profiles via her laptop and realizes that he didn't know much about his daughter. He gets support from Detective Vick.

Black US Christmas comedy starring Billy Bob Thornton. He plays a drunk, washed-up department store Santa Claus who always clears out a shopping mall on Christmas Eve with his diminutive partner Marcus. In Phoenix, he meets the boy Thurman, who lives alone with his senile grandmother and desperately believes in Santa Claus.
Documentary by the former singer of the band \Echt\"
column3: Kim Frank. 20 years after the band broke up
column4: the five musicians Kim
column5: Kai
column6: Andreas
column7: Florian and Gunnar meet up again and look back on their youth together. The documentary was created from over 240 hours of private archive material and provides an insight into the career of one of the most successful German bands of the 90s."

abstract: Norwegian drama by Joachim von Trier. Erik and Phillip are best friends in their early 20s. Both want to become writers, but at first only Phillip is successful. But then Phillip develops a psychosis triggered by his relationship with his girlfriend Kari. While he tries to find his way back into his life after a long period of treatment, Erik is now a successful author.
Decades after his father went mad in a hotel and tried to kill him, Danny Torrance has stabilized. He no longer uses his \shining\"
column3: his psychic gift
column4: but then young Abra makes contact with him telepathically. She knows of a group of beings who feed on people with shining and who also become dangerous to her."

abstract: It's been a while since screenwriter Keith's last successes and, in desperate need of money, he accepts an offer to teach screenwriting at a remote university. Because he only accepts attractive young women, he increasingly likes the job. But then the more mature Holly arouses his interest.

After Marge gets food poisoning, she has nightmares. It's about her fear that Bart and Lisa are growing up and their childhood days are over. But there's also the annual bouncing competition at elementary school, for which Bart feels too old, and Marge does everything she can to be there despite her poor health.

Maggie knocks Homer out with a hammer, just like she saw in an Itchy & Scratchy cartoon. Marge is horrified by the violence on TV and turns to producer Roger Meyers. He makes fun of Marge's complaint, but he hasn't reckoned on the fact that this \madwoman\" soon gathers many concerned parents around her who put pressure on the station."

While skateboarding, Bart is hit by a car driven by Mr. Burns. The billionaire then wants to pay Homer 100 dollars in compensation, which wouldn't even cover the medical costs. But Homer turns to shyster lawyer Lionel Hutz, who, together with Dr. Nick, massively exaggerates Bart's injuries in order to get a lot of money. But this displeases Marge.

When the Simpson family eats at a Japanese restaurant, Homer orders puffer fish, which is poisonous if prepared incorrectly. But the apprentice making the meal makes a mistake and Homer learns that he only has 24 hours to live. He makes a list of what he wants to do in that time, but soon realizes that he can't stick to the list.

Homer has cable TV illegally activated. At first, all the Simpsons are delighted with the program selection. But in Sunday school, Bart and Lisa are taught that you can only go to heaven if you keep the Ten Commandments. Now Lisa is plagued by remorse. Because the eighth commandment is: Thou shalt not steal.

Law student Julie Parlo's grandmother has been kidnapped. Julie asks Adrian Monk for help, but because she has no money, she promises him that she has found a way to get him back on the police force. But the kidnappers have an unusual demand: Julie is to buy a meal for the homeless in the district.

The driver of a tow truck is killed by a sniper, causing the vehicle to collide with Captain Stottlemeyer's wife's car, critically injuring her. Because the driver was a scab, the enraged Stottlemeyer believes the union leader is involved. Monk tries to restrain his ex-boss ...

Lieutenant Disher asks Adrian for help because his mother has spontaneously married an antiques dealer who is 20 years younger than her and wants to go to a group couples counseling program at an institute with her immediately afterwards. Sharona comes up with the idea of Adrian and her registering for the therapy disguised as a married couple.

Shortly before his execution, a death row inmate is poisoned with his last meal. Dale the Whale, a fellow inmate whom Monk had put behind bars, wants the culprit to be found. He baits Monk into believing that he has information about the murder of his wife Trudy, and Monk actually goes to prison incognito.

Monk has traveled to New York with Sharona, Captain Stottlemeyer and Lieutenant Disher because a criminal there is said to have information about the murder of Monk's wife. But while still in the hotel, they witness the murder of the Latvian ambassador. Monk is asked to help the New York police in exchange for access to the criminal.

While Monk searches unsuccessfully for a replacement for his assistant Sharona, he gets a new case: single mother Natalie has stabbed a burglar in self-defense after another person tried to break into her house a few days earlier. While Monk puzzles over why the perpetrator was interested in the aquarium, Natalie supports him.

Just as Lieutenant Disher and Captain Stottlemeyer are about to arrest a criminal biker, they are shot at from a car and Stottlemeyer is injured. Monk isn't much help this time because, on the advice of his doctor, he tries a new drug that is supposed to take away his fears. But this causes him to become so relaxed that he can no longer concentrate.
A man is murdered and all the evidence points to a martial arts star as the culprit. But Sonny Chow, known as \the Cobra\"
column3: has been dead for years
column4: even if some fans don't want to believe it. Monk has another problem
column5: however
column6: because Natalie insists that he pay her expenses for him
column7: something he never did with Sharona."

abstract: Monk sees a gangster commit a murder by chance. Since the man has already eliminated witnesses several times, Monk has to go into the witness protection program, accompanied by Natalie and Stottlemeyer. But Monk wouldn't be himself if he didn't come across another murder even in a cabin in the woods.

Two-year-old foster child Tommy goes missing in a park and, when he reappears, has a severed finger with him. Monk hopes that the boy can take him to where he found it and walks through the park with him. The two grow fond of each other and because Tommy can't stay with his foster parents, Monk takes him into his care, much to everyone's surprise.

Mitch and Cam are worried because Lily is becoming more and more withdrawn. They manage to take her to an exclusive party thrown by a vlogger who they think Lily is a big fan of. Phil has been trying to sell Pepper, Mitch and Cam's friend, a house for a long time, but he always finds fault with it. Meanwhile, Jay is worried because his dog Stella needs an operation.

A true-to-life computer-animated remake of the 1994 animated film. Simba is the young son of Mufasa, the Lion King, and is to become his successor. But Mufasa's brother Scar plots against him and kills Mufasa. Simba, who is thought to be dead, feels guilty and withdraws.

Music teacher and pianist Joe lives for jazz and sees his big chance when he is asked to fill in for a gig at short notice. But before he does, he has an accident and his soul ends up in the \Great Before\"
column3: where souls are prepared for their life on earth. His opportunity to return to earth is now chained to \"Soul 22\"
column4: who thinks nothing of earth."

abstract: The baby shower for Haley is to take place at Jay and Gloria's, on the day of the Super Bowl of all days, which Jay is not alone in wanting to celebrate. But things are not going well in the family as there have been various arguments between the family members, mostly due to misunderstandings. It goes so far that Dylan leaves with his feelings hurt.

Phil accompanied Haley to an prenatal class where she showed disastrous mothering skills. This robs him of sleep, which leads to problems while shooting a realtor commercial. Cam and Mitch are surprised by Lily's first menstrual period and bring in all the female family members to support her. Claire, meanwhile, gets a job offer.

Set in the 1920s in the Sea Islands off the Carolina coast where the Gullah people have preserved much of their African heritage and language, \Daughters Of The Dust\" chronicles the lives of the Peazants
column3: a large
column4: proud family who trace their origins to the Ibo
column5: who were enslaved and brought to the islands more than one hundred years before."

abstract: Jay goes on his annual trip through the wilderness, but because Gloria doesn't want him to go alone, Mitch, Cam and Phil have to come along, which Jay is not happy about. Meanwhile, Claire wants to assemble the new cribs with the other women, which doesn't go well, so even the pizza delivery guy Haley called gets involved.

The toy figures featuring Cowboy Woody and Buzz Lightyear have found a new owner in the girl Bonnie. She makes a new toy out of garbage called Forky, who joins the group. But Forky disappears during a road trip. Woody tries everything to get him back to his owner.

This year, the family gets together for Thanksgiving at Cam and Mitch's, who have even set up a small petting zoo. But Mitch only goes along because he has a guilty conscience towards Cam. Phil is less than pleased when he finds out that Haley wants to go on a short trip with her boyfriend instead of attending the family football game, and Joe makes friends with a goat.

Harper has been dating Abby for a year and invites her to spend Christmas with her family, in the belief that Abby won't accept because she doesn't like the family holiday. But because Abby is serious about the relationship, she comes with her. Harper has to confess that her family doesn't even know she's a lesbian, so Abby has to pretend to be a university roommate.

The young Irish woman Eilis emigrates to America in 1951 at her sister's request in order to have a better future. She finds accommodation with other Irish women in a boarding house in Brooklyn and quickly gets a job. Nevertheless, she suffers from homesickness. This changes when she meets the Italian Tony, who courts her. But then she unexpectedly has to return to Ireland.

Imaginative animated film by Hayao Miyazaki from 1992, set in Italy at the end of the 1920s. Some time ago, fighter pilot Marco Paggot was a celebrated war hero. After leaving the military, Marco turned into a pig and has been called \Porco Rosso\" ever since. Now that the fascists are on the advance
column3: he has to put his skills to the test again."

abstract: Animated film about Patrick, a young butterfly who can't fly.
Four people start a very special business: they help grieving people to get over the death of their loved ones.
Film adaptation of the story of the pop duo \Milli Vanilli\" in the 1980s."
Based on the novel \The Talented Mr. Ripley\" by Patricia Highsmith
column3: this is the first film adaptation. Alain Delon plays the leading role in this 60s classic."

abstract: At the end of the 1990s, Laura from Finland is studying archaeology in Moscow. She actually wanted to go to Murmansk with her Russian girlfriend Irina to see rock drawings, but Irina canceled. So Laura shares a train compartment with the rude Russian Lyokha, who is drunk and immediately starts chatting her up. But over the course of the journey, which lasts several days, the two become closer.

Stop motion animation by Wallace & Gromit creator Nick Park. After the tribe of the young Stone Age man Dug was driven out of his valley by the powerful Bronze Age leader Lord Nooth, Dug wants to reclaim his homeland - with a game of soccer. But unlike his ancestors, Dug's tribe has no idea about soccer.

Phil wants to be a male role model for his son Luke and his daughters' partners Dylan and Bill. That's why he invites them to a guys' evening, but it doesn't go as planned. Mitch has forgotten the wedding anniversary and wants to make up for it by spontaneously coming along to a western party, and Jay presents his dog accessories on a teleshopping channel.

The writer Henri had great success with a book before his marriage, but things haven't gone so well since then. He blames his wife and four children, now grown up, for this. When a stray dog appears in the garden, he takes it in against the wishes of the others. \Stupid\" becomes his best friend
column3: while the humans can no longer stand him."

abstract: Claire has decided to stop being so negative and say yes more often. But this leads to complications, especially when it comes to Luke's new, much older girlfriend. Phil visits Alex at university, but she's embarrassed, especially as she's about to receive an award. Mitch and Cam went to a wild party with young people, which Cam wants to repeat.

Harold Click leads an orderly and lonely life until one day, while brushing his teeth, he hears a narrator's voice commenting on his existence. His life is turned upside down and Harold Click has to find out whether he is living in a comedy or a tragedy and, above all, how his story ends.

Janis, who is almost 40 and living alone, meets Arturo, who is to help her with the exhumation of a mass grave from the Franco regime. They have an affair and Janis becomes pregnant. In the maternity ward she becomes friends with the unintentionally pregnant underage Ana and they both give birth on the same day. But after a few months Janis begins to have doubts about her child.
British comedy series in the style of a mockumentary. David Hasselhoff plays himself, who is looking for a way to get his career back on track in the UK.

German crime series that was broadcast from 1974 to 1998. The title character is Chief Inspector Stephan Derrick, played by Horst Tappert, who investigates in Munich together with his assistant, Inspector Harry Klein (Fritz Wepper). All 281 episodes were written by Herbert Reinecker.
Norwegian film adaptation of the bestseller of the same name by author and philosopher Jostein Gaarder.

So close to giving birth, Haley has the feeling that she would rather be married to Dylan after all. This is to be done in secret, with Alex as their witness. But Claire learns about it and soon the whole family is gathered together. Even Jay, who has a celebrity animal with him to sell his dog beds, and Mitch and Cam, who actually want to go to a musical premiere.

A lawyer and his secretary are stabbed to death and a burnt document points to Lawrence Grayson, a dissatisfied client. When Monk questions him, he also meets his neighbor Monica, with whom he has a dispute over a garage. Monica not only looks like Monk's deceased wife, the widow is also very understanding of his quirks. Monk is fascinated ...

Because the principal of the high school has had an accident, Cam is supposed to lead the graduation ceremony, where Jay will also give a speech. But things don't go as expected for either of them. Claire and Phil are proud that Alex has graduated from Caltech and want to brag about it. Meanwhile, Manny and Joe realize that their mother has probably been cheating on their successes.

The authentic story of John Dillinger, played by Johnny Depp: As an old-school gangster and bank robber, Dillinger enjoys a certain popularity among women and the general public during the Great Depression, but must increasingly resist and ultimately succumb to more modern times in the form of competing criminals and new methods of crime-fighting by the FBI.

Petrunija is overweight, unemployed and unpopular. By chance, she gets caught up in a religious ceremony where the aim is to be the first to get hold of a cross thrown into a river. Petrunija spontaneously jumps into the water and fetches the cross. But only men are allowed to do this, and Petrunija incurs the wrath of the locals. Even the police can't get her to return the cross.

During the San Francisco Marathon, a woman is murdered and thrown out of the window of her high-rise apartment. She was having an affair with family man Trevor McDowell, who was running in the marathon, as the electronic recording proves. Monk, a former runner himself, is nevertheless certain that he must have been the murderer.

The family members look back on the birthdays they celebrated last year. Phil has decided to learn piano and Spanish to celebrate his 50th, Jay is being roasted by everyone and Manny suffers a serious loss on his special day. But then there are also two new birthdays ...

Principal Skinner loses his job after claiming that women are not good at science. The new principal introduces gender segregation at the school. But Lisa feels completely underwhelmed by the new math lessons for girls only.

The Dunphys are under stress because Haley's twins just won't sleep and Haley has different parenting ideas to her mother. Jay wants to do a dog commercial and Manny's ex Sherry is involved, who he wants to win back. Cam has students from his high school at home when a porcelain figurine disappears, while Alex is researching in Antarctica.

Halloween episode in three parts: Bart becomes a Non-Fungible Token and Marge tries to rescue him from the blockchain, a grown-up Lisa searches for a serial killer as a criminal psychologist after her brother's death, and a pandemic caused by Homer causes the population to mutate into all Homers.

Cam has bought an intelligent, talking fridge, which Mitch doesn't think much of at first. But he soon gets on brilliantly with the appliance. Claire has an interview at home with a business magazine and wants the family out of the house to avoid embarrassment. Phil thinks Gloria is the best student on his course and therefore comes down particularly hard on her, which he soon regrets.

Detective Jang Hae-joon investigates the death of a climber found at the foot of a mountain. The reaction of the attractive Chinese widow is conspicuous, and there are signs that she was abused by her husband, but she has an alibi. Hae-joon observes her, becoming increasingly attracted to the mysterious woman.

\Star Trek\" takes place in an alternative timeline in the Federation universe. A Romulan mining ship from the future attacks the USS Kelvin about 20 years before the first flight of the first Enterprise. In the process
column3: James T. Kirk's father is killed. The resulting events lead to the reunion of the Enterprise crew
column4: who must stop the Romulans from destroying Earth."

abstract: Judy, who comes from the countryside, fulfills her childhood dream of being the first rabbit to become a police officer in a big city inhabited only by animals. But they don't take her seriously and only let her work as a traffic warden. But then she gets the chance to find a missing otter. She forces the trickster Nick to help her, even though he is her parents' enemy as a fox.

The tour manager of country singer Willie Nelson is murdered in a backyard. The only witness is a blind woman who clearly recognizes Nelson's voice, and surveillance cameras only show him and the blind woman at the crime scene. Monk is a big fan of Willie Nelson and is sure that he is innocent.

A plague has wiped out almost the entire female population. Young Rag, whose mother died of the plague when Rag was a baby, is immune and is now kept hidden by her father. They live mainly in the wilderness and avoid humans, but men with evil intentions keep coming after them.
Sequel to the 1986 pilot film: Because \Maverick\" Mitchell doesn't play by the rules as a test pilot
column3: he is not well regarded by the Navy leadership. But his old flying buddy Iceman makes sure that he returns to Top Gun - albeit only as an instructor for a dangerous mission. Included in the mission is
column4: of all people
column5: the son of a friend for whose death 30 years ago Maverick feels responsible."

abstract: Billionaire Hammond and his wife Erin are directed to a backyard by their car navigation system, where they are shot dead. Because Erin was killed first, Monk believes that the crime was against her, although unlike her husband, she had no enemies. But baseball star Scott Gregorio was having an affair with Erin. Conveniently, Sharon's son Benji could use some coaching in baseball...

The Dunphy family are fed up with always being stuck with Haley's twins, but then they discover the benefits of being out in public with them. Gloria's sister Sonia introduces her new partner, but Gloria thinks he's just after Sonia's money. Meanwhile, Mitch and Cam have new neighbors who seem perfect - too perfect.

Japanese anime film by director Hayao Miyazaki. Two girls find the friendly creature Totoro in the forest, who can only be seen by children, and make friends with him. But one day, one of the girls disappears and an adventurous search begins.

After the First World War, Belgian soldier Paul Bergot comes to the USA in search of a pen pal with whom he has fallen in love. To make ends meet, he becomes an assistant to the stage performer and weightlifter \Zandow the Great\". Things get complicated when he drops out and Paul has to manage the show alone
column3: because he is anything but strong..."

abstract: Plastic surgeon Ernest Menville (Bruce Willis) leaves his fiancée Helen Sharp (Goldie Hawn) to marry the unsuccessful actress Madeline Ashton (Meryl Streep). 14 years later, Helen reappears and wants Ernest back - over Madeline's dead body. But that's easier said than done...

Armin is the father of 13-year-old Bo, the result of a relationship with his deceased girlfriend Monika. Now Armin wants to have another child with his new girlfriend Ellen. However, the doctor tells him that he is infertile and always has been! So Bo cannot be his son. Armin sets off in search of the real father - with a big twist included...
This documentary sheds light on the flooding of the earth with plastic. It deals with the littering of the oceans and land, as well as health aspects and recycling methods.

Comedy from 1986 with Tom Hanks. The couple Walter and Anna need a new place to stay at short notice, but have little money. Walter soon gets a very cheap offer, especially as the place looks like a magnificent villa from the outside. They sign the contract, but soon realize that they have bought a dump in urgent need of renovation.

A woman is killed by a parcel bomb. She was in an inheritance dispute with her two brothers. Monk is certain that one of them, Brian Babbage, is the sole perpetrator. The only problem is that he has been in a coma for months. Monk also has problems in his private life, because not only is his therapist on vacation, but Sharona's ex shows up and wants to take her and Benji to New Jersey.

The director of an educational camp for delinquent youths has the inmates dig deep holes in the hard ground of a lake that dried up a long time ago in the blazing heat of the Texan sun under strict supervision as a character-building educational measure. But as time goes by, the inmates begin to doubt whether this is the real reason for the measure...

After a professional break, hitman Ladybug is given a seemingly simple assignment: to steal a suitcase from a high-speed train in Japan. But there are several other killers on board who have different missions or simply want personal revenge. As the journey progresses, the train turns into a bloodbath...
A deep dive into the world of disinformation, exploring how and why it’s spreading at pace throughout NZ and the world, and the striking consequences for social cohesion and democracy.

After the passing of his wife, a lonely newspaper editor discovers Berenalin - a medication that promises to put an end to his grief. Its effects begin to drive a wedge between him and his daughter, who needs him more than ever.
US western television series that was broadcast by CBS from 1955 to 1975. There were 635 episodes in 20 seasons.
The sitcom was broadcast on CBS from 1975 to 1985 and is about the African-American Jefferson family, who move to the posh Upper East Side of New York City.
In order to recover some stolen diamonds, an insurance company hires the Reed couple. They manage to take the diamonds from a mafia boss, but instead of delivering them, they make off with them...

Two and a Half Men is a US sitcom on the television channel CBS that revolves around an unlikely trio. Alan moves in with his brother Charlie after divorcing his wife Judith. From now on, the successful heartthrob not only has to look after his neurotic brother, but also his clumsy and not too clever son Jake.

Mitch and Cam want to take Lily to a pool party, but she doesn't want to go because she's unhappy with her body. Phil's estate agent signs are stolen and Gloria even tries to use Jay's dog tracker to find the thief, because she really wants the job with Phil. Meanwhile, Claire tries to convince her two daughters how great it is to have a career.

The resolute scientist Lily Houghton is determined to find a legendary tree whose flowers are said to have healing powers. That's why she travels to the Amazon with her brother in 1916. Captain Frank Wolff is to take them to their destination in his battered riverboat. But many dangers lurk on their journey into the unknown ...

For Marge's birthday, Bart and Lisa actually want to give her something decent this time, but instead only get her a protector for her ironing board. When they realize how disappointed her mother is with the present, they look for a better one. They find out that Marge had a parrot as a child. Homer, meanwhile, has discovered an app that can be used to warn others of danger.

It's Halloween again and this time Claire can't seem to be scared by anything, while Phil is the frightened one. Cam and Mitch let Lily go to a party so they can go out themselves, but soon regret it, while Gloria has a complex about her age and Alex and Luke get into trouble with their partners.

Conor is an imaginative boy who has an intimate relationship with his single mother. But he has to face difficult problems: Not only is he bullied by classmates, he also has to cope with the slow and painful death of his cancer-stricken mom. In Conor's fantasy world, a gnarled old tree comes to life...

Luke wants to present his parents with a business idea for which he wants to drop out of college, but Claire, who is having career problems of her own, is against it. Gloria is looking after Haley's twins, but not without ulterior motives, because she wants to have them baptized in secret, and Cam is in trouble with the school mascot, just when he's hoping for a career advancement.

Tasya Vos's job is to secretely take over the bodies and minds of her victims for an organization using brain implants and to commit murders and subsequent suicides through them. But Tasya's bloody work does not leave her unscathed, and when she invades the body of an unscrupulous businessman's son-in-law, it soon becomes unclear who is in control.

Due to an unintentional mistake on Mitch's part, his and Cam's friends believe that they have broken up. But they only contact Cam to offer support. Haley tries unsuccessfully to make Thanksgiving dinner for the family with Alex and Luke, while Claire misses her job and Jay takes Phil out to fly his model plane.

After a failed rocket launch, French aerospace engineer Didier Mathure is transferred to the GEPAN department, which is tasked with investigating extraterrestrial phenomena. The aim is to disband the office staffed by three eccentrics, but the rationalist is soon confronted with inexplicable events.

In the docudrama, four Jews tell how they survived the Third Reich hiding in Berlin as teenagers, which is portrayed in scenes with actors: While Cioma Schönhaus was active as a passport forger, Hanni Lévy disguised herself as a German, as did Ruth Arndt as a housekeeper for a Nazi officer, whereas Eugen Friede was active in a resistance group.

Crossfire is the investigative documentary by an international team of journalists about two reporters, Andrea Rocchelli and Andrej Mironov, killed in eastern Ukraine, and the Ukrainian soldier Vitaly Markiv accused of their murder

Dylan's hippie mother has moved in with the Dunphys, which Claire and Phil don't like at all, but when Claire's late mother's widower comes to visit, Claire has an idea. When Cam and Mitch learn from a lesbian couple friend that they want a child, they would like to be sperm donors - or not. Meanwhile, Jay and Gloria want to help Manny get over his heartache.
Conceived as a German version of the British series \Til Death Do Us Part\"
column3: \"Ein Herz und eine Seele\" was the first television series to follow the American sitcom format and deal with current political developments. More than 30 years after its first broadcast
column4: the series is still frequently shown on German TV channels and on public holidays such as New Year's Eve."

abstract: Eva and Arthur are supposedly the only guests in a lonely hostel. But is that really true?

The burglar alarm is triggered at music producer Blackburn's house. He escapes into the panic room with his chimpanzee, but when the police open the locked room, Blackburn has been shot and the monkey is holding the gun. The case seems clear and the chimpanzee is to be euthanized as the killer. But Sharona has taken the animal to her heart and Monk is supposed to help ...

Two families visit an abandoned mountain village to celebrate their wedding together. The only bridge is destroyed by a rockslide and there is no way of contacting the outside world. Several deaths occur one after the other...

Swedish comedy series about the young child psychologist Gösta, who gets his first job in a child and adolescent psychiatric clinic in a small Swedish town. There he tries to be particularly nice and helpful, but it doesn't always work out.
During the student unrest, the revolting architecture student Carlo begins an affair with the daughter of an industrialist. Sex movie with a political background.
Jules Verne adaptation: In 1860, a courier has to carry a message from the Tsar through the territory of the rebellious Tartars.

The scientist Dr. Paul Dean creates a killer parasite on behalf of the government. An accident occurs in which a parasite escapes from its container and implants itself in the scientist's body. Later, when a gang that has previously tangled with Dean gains access to the scientist's hotel room, a parasite is accidentally released...

The whole family meets up at Mitch and Cam's for Christmas dinner, but there are arguments everywhere: Manny is angry with Luke for stealing his girlfriend, Gloria no longer wants to work with Phil, nor does Claire at Jay's dog basket company, and Cam obviously has a secret from Mitch.

Paul Harley kills his mistress, but the police only find a torso that cannot be identified. Captain Stottlemeyer has Commissioner Brooks after him, who fires Monk when Monk accidentally deletes all the old cases on a computer. Monk is desperate, and to make matters worse, Stottlemeyer's wife is filming the mishap-ridden investigation for a documentary.

Because the Dane Daniel Rye can no longer pursue his sports career after an injury, he starts taking photographs. On his own initiative, he wants to capture life in war-torn Syria, but is captured by Isis. Together with other foreign hostages, an ordeal begins as the kidnappers want more money than Daniel's family can raise.

Marge buys a tandem bike, but no one wants to ride with her. Out of pity, Bart takes her on bike rides and turns into a mama's boy. Homer, meanwhile, has bought himself a dumbbell and only trained his right arm. When Moe finds out, he wants to use it to beat people at arm wrestling.

Alex has been moved into a luxury apartment building by her new employer. Guests are not supposed to have access to the building's facilities, but the family members have memorized Alex's access code and - unbeknownst to each other - have secretly gotten into the building, where the unsuspecting concierge Higgins takes care of them.

In 1957, Brooklyn insurance lawyer James Donovan is assigned the task of defending Rudolf Abel, who has been exposed as a Soviet spy. This makes him enemies, but he manages to ensure that Abel is not sentenced to death so that he can be used for a spy swap at some point. Some time later, US pilot Powers is arrested in the USSR and Donovan is sent to Berlin to negotiate.

After the husband of successful writer Sandra Voyter falls to his death from the house they share, the investigators soon have Sandra under suspicion, as their only options are suicide or murder. She is charged, and in the course of the trial, details of their married life come to light which lead to the fact that not even their 11-year-old son is sure of Sandra's innocence.

A supermarket employee is murdered, but the police believe it was an accident. Store detective Joe Christie sends for Monk, whom he knows from their time together on the police force. Although Monk no longer wants to have anything to do with Christie, he hires himself out as an employee to find the murderer ...

Monk's father-in-law invites him to Los Angeles because he suspects fraud on a TV game show he is producing. Since Sharona is not there, Monk is accompanied by his annoying neighbor Kevin. While he tries to find out how the contestant is cheating, he is confronted with many memories of his dead wife Trudy at his in-laws' house.
In the 1950s, married couple Lucille Ball and Desi Arnaz are the stars of the sitcom \I Love Lucy\". But the production is grueling
column3: Desi practically plays second fiddle to his perfectionist wife
column4: while she suspects him of infidelity. What's more
column5: Lucille was a member of the Communist Party decades ago
column6: which could cost them their careers if the press finds out."

abstract: Three men meet at the home of their deceased colleague's widow Akiko and their daughter to commemorate the anniversary of his death. Young Ayako is of marriageable age and so the three friends introduce her to a young man. However, Ayako does not want her mother to live alone after a wedding. So the three men decide to marry Akiko off as well.

Monk is on his way back from an event with Natalie and her daughter when they get stuck in a traffic jam due to a car accident. Monk immediately realizes that the supposed accident victim has been murdered, but the police don't want to know anything about it. Natalie is disappointed that Monk is only interested in the case, but not in what happened to her and her daughter.

Drunken Captain Stottlemeyer calls Monk late at night from Las Vegas to tell him that he has found out how casino owner Thorn killed his wife, who was strangled in the elevator by her scarf. But when Monk and Natalie get to Vegas, Stottlemeyer can't remember anything ...

Natalie is running for the school board when a gunman shoots at her campaign office several times. No one is hurt and Natalie is determined to continue her campaign against everyone's advice. Her rival is another patient of Monk's therapist, of all people, and he seems to have a better connection to the doctor than the jealous Monk.

Since Dr. Dolittle lost his beloved wife, he has withdrawn from people and lives as a recluse with his animals. But when the Queen falls seriously ill, he feels compelled to help. In order to find a cure, he must not only embark on an adventurous journey, but also face up to his loss...

Kate is worried because her 18-year-old daughter Nina is traveling abroad for the first time. She wants to spend a few weeks working in an orphanage in Belize. When Nina suddenly doesn't get in touch, Kate, who is a detective in the Miami drug squad, sets out to find her herself...

Based on the semi-biographical coming-of-age novel of the same name by Trent Dalton, the drama series released by Netflix in 2024 tells the story of 13-year-old Eli Bell as his socially disadvantaged family living in Brisbane is dragged into the abyss by drug-related crime and corruption.

Phil learns that his father Frank may be mentally disturbed and decides to visit him in Florida. Claire and Mitch dig through their childhood stuff to prove dad Jay wrong about a vacation memory. Cam and Gloria help each other get back at their rivals, while Jay tries to boost his dog bed sales with the help of Joe.

American drama by Scott Hicks set in the 1950s: a fisherman is found dead and his Japanese colleague is accused of murder. Journalist Ishmael Chambers (Ethan Hawke) is assigned to the case and during his research meets his childhood sweetheart Hatsue, who turns out to be the wife of the accused.

Professor Bacterio, a scientist, has invented a weapon that uses radiation to manipulate people so that they become demoralized and refuse to work. However, the weapon is stolen and the TIA (Transinternational Agent Ring) secret service chief Vicente not only deploys his two agents Mort & Phil to search for it, but also a new detective, which leads to friction.

The US action series was produced from 1993 to 2001 and ran for 8 seasons. The main character is Texas Ranger Cordell Walker (Chuck Norris), who makes Dallas safer together with his African-American partner James Trivette (Clarence Gilyard Jr.).

On her 18th birthday, blonde Catherine Miles visits her wealthy parents in the Brazilian Amazon. Shortly after her arrival, she is greeted by family members and two impoverished relatives. Following a suggestion from José, Catherine goes on a boat trip with her parents. The boat is attacked by strangers who kill her parents with poisoned arrows and sedate Catherine.

Tea goes home from handball with a school friend. In her apartment, she greets her mother Marie and her little brother and calls her working father before suddenly jumping out of her fourth-floor window. The completely shocked mother calls an ambulance and follows him to the hospital. The film takes place in real time and was shot without any visible cuts.

Evil Dead sequel, but without the well-known main actor Bruce Campbell alias Ash except for a short cameo: The 5 friends Mia, David, Eric, Olivia and Natalie meet in a remote cabin in the woods to help Mia through her drug withdrawal. But when one of them reads a strange book, he inadvertently summons the evil from hell...

Film trilogy by director Sam Raimi, which revolutionized the horror genre in the 1980s and enjoys cult status among fans and critics alike. While the first film was indexed in numerous countries due to its excessive depiction of violence, the subsequent parts are much more humorous and aimed at a wider audience.

Alex is looking for an assistant for her work and gets Jay's old co-worker Margaret on the eye, Cam and Mitch suddenly have a previous tenant in the house who has come to die, Phil gets a visit from former neighbor Kenneth, who invites him on a space flight, while Manny's biological father Javier wants to take his son on a trip around the world.

The self-confident waitress Zola meets Stefani, who, like her, works as a stripper from time to time. The very next day, Stefani invites Zola on a trip to Florida, supposedly to strip. But the mysterious X and the dim-witted Derrek are also along for the ride. It soon becomes clear that it's not about stripping. The film is based on Zola's partly true tweets, which went viral in 2015.

An elderly couple from the countryside decide to visit their grown-up children and their families in Tokyo. After the long train journey, they slowly realize that the eldest son, a doctor, and the eldest daughter, who runs a beauty salon, have little time for them. Only Noriko, the widow of the son who died in the Second World War, makes an effort to look after her in-laws.

Widowed professor Shukichi Somiya has a daughter of marriageable age called Noriko and wants to marry her off. However, Noriko prefers to live with her father as she does not want to leave him alone. To make it easier for her to leave her father's house, Somiya pretends to be in a relationship with a younger woman.

Mathematically gifted Jerry is sent into retirement, but doesn't know what to do with himself. Then he realizes that there is a loophole in a lottery system that means you always win if you buy a lot of tickets. Together with his wife Marge, he sets up a system that not only gives their marriage a new lease of life, but also helps the inhabitants of their small town.

Sharona has become forgetful lately and then she sees a man with a knife in his chest in an underground parking garage who talks about her deceased father. Since no one but her can see this man, she decides to take some time off. Monk gets the resolute Varla Davis from Sharona's writing course as a replacement assistant - much to his chagrin ...

A jeweler is being blackmailed, but he and a security guard are shot dead while handing over the loot. When Monk tries to investigate the crime scene, the shady private detective Marty Eels arrives and finds crucial clues before Monk does. While Captain Stottlemeyer is thrilled, Monk is certain that Eels is cheating ...

On Halloween, the driver of an armored car is shot dead in front of his vehicle in a supermarket parking lot. But Monk is disturbed by a call from his brother Ambrose: their father wants to come over after decades. Monk drives to Ambrose's house with Natalie and her daughter Julie. But there's a disguised man in the neighborhood who steals the children's Halloween candy.

Natalie finds a pizza delivery man shot dead in his vehicle, who had delivered a pizza to her shortly before. Monk is no help, however, because he has the flu and is suffering in bed at home. The police also have other priorities since an important judge has disappeared. So Natalie takes the case into her own hands and puts herself in danger ...

Financial analyst Warren Kemp's hand is broken in the company garage after the perpetrator has killed a security guard. Because Kemp no longer feels safe, Mr. Monk is infiltrated into the office community. He fits in, is popular and is even invited to go bowling. But there he is asked to put on second-hand shoes - unimaginable for him!
US series about the Shaolin monk Kwai Chang Caine, who lives in the USA and has various adventures there with the help of Shaolin Kung Fu, his Buddhist philosophy and his other skills.

Composer John Russell, whose family is killed in an accident, tries to make a fresh start and retreats to an old house. There, however, he gradually witnesses supernatural phenomena, voices are heard and he has visions of a drowned boy. In a séance, he wants to get to the bottom of the matter. And soon a terrible secret comes to light.

A sensitive melodrama by François Ozon, in which Charlotte Rampling plays a wife whose husband disappears without a trace on the beach. As she is unable to come to terms with his death and does not seek any help, she then begins to lie to herself that she can still see her husband and talk to him. Those around her react with irritation.

US series in which psychologist Kristen Bouchard, soon-to-be Catholic priest David Acosta and handyman Ben Shakir investigate mysterious events to see whether there is a natural explanation or whether they are supernatural phenomena.
13-part television film series from the 1990s with individual episodes from the Old and New Testaments.
The story of a miserable author who still hasn't managed to publish a book.

Mr. Monk is at a winery with Natalie, where he regularly commemorates his wedding anniversary with his deceased wife. He wants to have a glass of wine alone that evening, but is disturbed by an annoying new arrival. However, the next morning he has disappeared and no one except Monk claims to have ever seen him. Natalie also believes that her boss has been drinking too much ...

Mr. Monk finally seems to have taken a decisive step forward in coming to terms with the death of his wife Trudy, as his therapist Dr. Kroger also notes. But then Natalie meets a woman in a diner who looks just like her and is also called Trudy. From what she overhears, Trudy has only pretended to be dead and is now in search of an important key.

Natalie's brother is getting married and, for lack of alternatives, she takes Randy to the wedding. To everyone's surprise, Natalie's family turns out to be very wealthy, but there is a dispute between her and her parents. When Randy is hit by a car driven by a stranger, Mr. Monk has to stand in for him. Simultaneously, he tries to find the culprit ...

After her housekeeper is murdered by burglars, Sherry Judd turns to Mr. Monk. He remembers her very well because he was in love with her in high school, but Sherry preferred someone else. While Monk takes care of the case, he also remembers the time in 1972 when Sherry was accused of stealing money from the school.

After Stan Carlisle burns down a house with a dead body in 1939, he accidentally ends up at a traveling carnival. There he learns from mentalist Pete and his wife Zeena. When Pete dies, Stan sets up his own business with the attractive Molly and gives shows in wealthy circles. But he also wants to get his victims' money and for this he needs the inscrutable female psychiatrist Dr. Ritter.

A dramatic thriller about two brothers in financial difficulties who plan a robbery but fail and try to come to grips with the devastating consequences. Comeback and last film by old master Sidney Lumet.

On the afternoon of the Christmas party at the police station, a bottle of poisoned wine is delivered for Captain Stottlemeyer. Without suspecting it, he gives the bottle to a colleague, who drinks from it and dies. Stottlemeyer is certain that Frank Prager was the culprit, as he has tried to kill him before. To find him, Monk even has to play Santa Claus.

US thriller from 1958: John Jackson and Noah Cullen (Tony Curtis and Siney Poitier) are in prison, their different skin colors make them enemies. When they manage to escape during a prisoner transport, they are forced to rethink their attitudes towards each other as they are tied together. The film was directed by Stanley Kramer.

Lassie the Collie helped wherever she could, whether it was rescuing a person from a burning house or chasing a crook, the clever Lassie could do it all. You could watch Lassie's adventures for about 20 years, which is how long the series was produced.

A virus turns the majority of humanity into flesh-eating zombies. Three men set out in search of an answer to the question of how all this could have happened. In the process, they meet a wide variety of survivors.
After her brother David dies in a car accident, Darcy sets out to find the organ recipient of David's donor heart in the hope that something of her beloved brother is still alive.

Angola: Nina is standing in the middle of a minefield in the scorching heat. Despite the tough training and the ever-present danger to her life, Nina makes a fatal mistake: she gets distracted and steps on a landmine in the same second.

Monk wants to buy the same shirts as always from his favorite men's outfitter, but they are flawed. At the shirt factory, he meets Mexican inspector Maria Ortiz, whose son is accused of murdering a model. The case seems clear-cut, but Monk investigates it and meets the arrogant fashion designer Julian Hodge.

Mr. Monk is robbed at a truck stop and thrown unconscious onto a truck, which drives off at that moment. The next morning he wakes up in a small town and doesn't even remember his name. The peculiar Cora takes advantage of this and claims they are married. But Monk wouldn't be Monk if he didn't sense another case when a waitress disappears.

Su and Jack are constantly online. So they decide to live in a friend's remote cabin in the woods for a week without any contact with the outside world. Unfortunately, just then the earth is invaded by furry creatures from outer space. When some of them reach their hut, the two have no idea what to do ...

The parents of the family clan and Manny take a trip to Paris because, according to Manny's translation, Jay is to receive an award for his lifetime achievement in the closet industry. But when they get there, Gloria discovers that this is not true. Phil wants to surprise Claire in a café, but she runs into an ex from her student days, while Cam experiences disappointment as a clown.

Arthur travels to Amsterdam to end his life at a friend's euthanasia clinic. But the night before, he is disturbed by loud music coming from the room next door in his hotel. He wants to complain and meets young Claire, who is about to take her own life with pills. Prevented from doing so by Arthur, she spends one last night with him on the streets of Amsterdam.

A man is killed in a junkyard who was supposed to testify against a drug dealer. At the crime scene, a policeman insinuates to Captain Stottlemeyer that he had something going on with his wife. Since Stottlemeyer does indeed have marital problems, he lashes out at the policeman. Now Monk has to shadow the captain's wife while the captain must attend an anger management course.

Mr. Monk hasn't had any new cases for some time and is broke, and so is Natalie. So it comes in handy that a valuable diamond has been stolen from a museum and the insurance company has offered a reward of 1 million dollars. But three eccentric private detectives also want the money and are hot on Monk's heels.

A former lover of the famous astronaut Steve Wagner wants to publish a revealing book, which is why Wagner murders her. Monk is certain that Wagner is the culprit, but he was in space at the time of his death. Meanwhile, Natalie manages to get Monk and Wagner to perform in front of Julie's class, which doesn't go well for Monk ...

An armored car is robbed and the two guards are killed. Lieutenant Disher, however, is not physically present due to a toothache. When he is under anesthesia at the dentist's, he witnesses the doctor and his assistant killing someone, but Captain Stottlemeyer in particular refuses to believe him. So Monk has to overcome his extreme dental phobia ...
